title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt - Blood & Wine Expansion (GOG)
description:
Install instructions:
- Requires your game patch to v1.21
- Run "setup_the_witcher3_exp2_2.0.0.44.exe"
- Play
PLEASE REMEMBER TO SEED, MANY OTHERS WANT THIS! :)
If you like this game, support the developers and BUY IT!

Title: WITCHER 3: WILD HUNT, THE - BLOOD AND WINE
Genre: Role-playing - Adventure - Fantasy
Works on: Windows (7, 8, 10)
Languages: Audio and text: Deutsch, English, franÃ§ais, æ—¥æœ¬èªž, polski, Ñ€ÑƒÑÑÐºÐ¸Ð¹. Text only: Ø§Ù„Ø¹Ø±Ø¨ÙŠØ©, PortuguÃªs do Brasil, ä¸­æ–‡, ÄeskÃ½, espaÃ±ol, EspaÃ±ol (AL), magyar, italiano, í•œêµ­ì–´
Features: single-player - multi-player - co-op - achievements - controller support
Released: May 31, 2016
Company: CD PROJEKT RED / CD PROJEKT RED
Rating:	ESRB Rating: Mature
Store page: https://www.gog.com/game/witcher_3_wild_hunt_the_blood_and_wine_pack

About:
Blood and Wine is the final expansion for The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt -- an award-winning role-playing game set in a vast fantasy open world.
"Death comes to the land of wineâ€
New region. Final quest.
Become professional monster slayer Geralt of Rivia and explore Toussaint, a remote land untouched by war, where you will unravel the horrifying secret behind a beast terrorizing the kingdom. With all trails leading to dead ends, only a witcher can solve the mystery and survive the evil lurking in the night. Introducing an entirely new realm to traverse, new characters and monsters, Blood and Wine is a 20+ hour adventure full of dark deeds, unexpected twists, romance and deceit.

Minimum system requirements - Windows: 
OS: 64-bit Windows 7 or 64-bit Windows 8 (8.1)
Processor: Intel CPU Core i5-2500K 3.3 GHz or AMD CPU Phenom II X4 940
Memory: RAM 6 GB 
Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660 / AMD GPU Radeon HD 7870
Please mind that we only officially support full-size desktop graphics cards
Hard Drive: 35 GB of available space 
DirectX: 11 
Additional requirements: Requires file system support for files up to 8 GB.

Recommended system requirements - Windows: 
OS: 64-bit Windows 7 or 64-bit Windows 8 (8.1)
Processor: Intel CPU Core i7 3770 3.4 GHz / AMD CPU AMD FX-8350 4 GHz
Memory: RAM 8 GB 
Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 770 / AMD GPU Radeon R9 290
Hard Drive: 35 GB of available space 
DirectX: 11 
Additional requirements: Requires file system support for files up to 8 GB
